Package org.vladislavb.onemediatesttask.exceprionHandler

Class GlobalExceptionHandler

java.lang.Object
org.vladislavb.onemediatesttask.exceprionHandler.GlobalExceptionHandler
@ControllerAdvice public class GlobalExceptionHandler extends Object
GlobalExceptionHandler is a centralized exception handler for the application. It intercepts exceptions thrown by controllers and returns appropriate HTTP responses with corresponding status codes and error messages. This class uses Spring's @ControllerAdvice annotation to handle exceptions globally.
Author:
Vladislav Baryshev

  • Method Details

    • handleException

      @ExceptionHandler(AuthenticationException.class) @ResponseStatus(FORBIDDEN) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> handleException(AuthenticationException ex)
      Handles AuthenticationException and returns a "FORBIDDEN" HTTP status code (403) along with an error message indicating authentication failure.
      Parameters:
      ex - the AuthenticationException that was thrown.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the error message and the 403 Forbidden status.

    • handleGenericException

      @ExceptionHandler(Exception.class) @ResponseStatus(INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> handleGenericException(Exception ex)
      Handles any other generic exceptions and returns an "INTERNAL_SERVER_ERROR" HTTP status code (500) along with a generic error message.
      Parameters:
      ex - the Exception that was thrown.
      Returns:
      a ResponseEntity containing the error message and the 500 Internal Server Error status.

    • handleConstraintViolationException

      @ExceptionHandler(jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException.class) @ResponseStatus(BAD_REQUEST) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<Map<String,String>> handleConstraintViolationException(jakarta.validation.ConstraintViolationException ex)
      Handles validation exceptions and returns a structured error response.
      Parameters:
      ex - ConstraintViolationException instance.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing validation error details.
